com.facebook.buck.jvm.java

Interface ConfiguredCompiler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AddsToRuleKey
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompileToJarStepFactory, JavacToJarStepFactory, KotlincToJarStepFactory, ScalacToJarStepFactory

    public interface ConfiguredCompiler
extends AddsToRuleKey
    Represents a compiler bundled with its basic configuration (boot classpath and the like).
